titleStmt.title: The fourth (and last) volume of discourses, or sermons, on several scriptures by Exekiel Hopkins ...
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, Ezekiel, 1634-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Clark, for J. Robinson, A. and J. Churchill, J. Taylor, and J. Wyat,

notesStmt.note: Each discourse has special t.p. and continous paging.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.

Practical Christianity recommended urged & encourage'd -- The assurance of heaven and salvation a powerful motive to serve God with fear -- A discourse of the motive, corruption, and renewing of the conscience -- A discourse upon perseverance in prayer -- A discourse upon the omnipresence of God.
